content.rendered:
All-On-4 Implants

All-On-4 Implants Gardena, CA

All-On-4 dental implant-supported dentures may be an excellent option for you if you are missing many or all your teeth. This style of implant-supported dentures provides a comfortable, natural looking solution.

What Are Implant Supported Dentures?

The advantage of the All-On-4 dental style dentures is that they are stabilized by dental implants. Eating and speaking are very comfortable, as these dentures are secure, stable and provide full functionality. All-On-4 dentures are permanent, cost-effective, and wearers enjoy a natural and beautiful smile.

What Is the All-On-4 Process?

The dental implants (which resemble tiny screws) will be placed first. They are surgically inserted into the jawbone to anchor your denture. In most cases, 4-6 dental implants are required per denture. After sufficient healing time, your denture is attached, and your denture is stable and secure. Many patients immediately experience the feel and functionality of natural teeth.

Book Your Appointment Now
